content:
{"name": "Campaign Against Hunger Brooklyn Community Food Distribution Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "please wait in your car and give us a call. Once you have received your order, please place your used pallets, garbage, and broken-down boxes in designated areas
For pick up questions, call: 718.773.3551 x 142
All other questions can be directed to: 718.773.3551
Note, you must have an appointment for pick up", "email": "", "url": "https://www.tcahnyc.org/locations/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "744 Berriman Street", "address_2": null, "city": "East New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11208", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.66072459999999, "longitude": -73.87302249999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 773-3551", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}]}
